comments.body: This type is called `StatsProvider` instead of `Provider` because it is embedded in `Kubelet`. If we call it `Provider` we will use it in kubelet as `kubelet.Provider`, which is confusing.

Does the struct `StatsProvider` implement the `stats.StatsProvider` interface? If true, you don't need to export this struct. Just let `NewCRIStatsProvider` and `NewCadvisorStatsProvider` return the `stats.StatsProvider` interface.
It does not fully implement the interface - functions like `GetPodByName()`, `GetNode()` in the interface are implemented by the `Kubelet`.
